title: Document Experiment in Electronic Lab Notebook
description: A bench scientist needs to document a completed experiment, including protocol, results, and analysis, in an ELN.

tasks.description: Create a new experiment entry in the ELN using a standard template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new entry and gives it a unique experiment ID.

tasks.description: Document the experimental protocol, including all reagents and steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately transcribes the protocol into the ELN.

tasks.description: Attach the raw data files from the laboratory instrument.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads and links the raw data files to the ELN entry.

tasks.description: Sign and submit the ELN entry for witnessing by a colleague.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent electronically signs the entry and routes it to their lab partner for countersigning.
